title.rendered: Conversations with a Killer: The Jeffrey Dahmer Tapes

content.rendered:
Directed by Joe Berlinger

Cast Park Dietz( Self – Forensic Psychiatrist for the Prosecution3 episodes, 2022 ). Wendy Patrickus( Self – Dahmer’s Defense Attorney3 episodes, 2022 ). Anne E. Schwartz( Self – Reporter, Milwaukee Journal3 episodes, 2022 ). Kenneth Smail( Self – Forensic Psychologist3 episodes, 2022 ). Michael Ross( Self – Friend of Victims3 episodes, 2022 ). Gerald P. Boyle( Self – Dahmer’s Lead Defense Attorney3 episodes, 2022 ). E. Michael McCann( Self – Milwaukee District Attorney3 episodes, 2022 ). Dennis Murphy( Self – Detective, Milwaukee PD3 episodes, 2022 ). Kenneth Meuler( Self – Lieutenant, Homicide Division, Milwaukee P.D. / …3 episodes, 2022 ). Jeff Fleming( Self – Reporter, Milwaukee NBC Affiliate3 episodes, 2022 ). James Causey( Self – Reporter, Milwaukee Sentinel3 episodes, 2022 ). Jeff Connor( Self – Tony Sears’ Friend3 episodes, 2022 ). Vernell Bass( Self – Dahmer’s Neighbor2 episodes, 2022 ). Eric Tyson( Self – Childhood Friend2 episodes, 2022 ). Fred Berlin( Self – Forensic Psychiatrist for the Defense2 episodes, 2022 ). Michail Takach( Self – Curator, Wisconsin LGBTQ History Project2 episodes, 2022 ). Jeffrey Jentzen( Self – Milwaukee Medical Examiner1 episode, 2022 ). Norman Goldfarb( Self – Psychologist, Evaluated Dahmer in 19881 episode, 2022 ). Crocker Stephenson( Self – Reporter, Milwaukee Sentinel1 episode, 2022 ). Roy Ratcliff( Self – Dahmer’s Pastor1 episode, 2022 ). Eric Michael Hambury( Jeffrey Dahmer1 episode, 2022 )

Language English

Producers Joe Berlinger. Johanna Byer. Jon Doran. James Fleischel. Rob Garver. Jen Isaacson. Jonathan Jordan. Jon Kamen. Lucy Kennedy. Rusty Lemorande. Julia Lewis. Emma McNamara. Josh Modell. Yuki Ogino. Catharine Park. Kristen Rockmaker. Ted Schillinger. Austin Short. Wyatt Stone. Noah Weitzman. Christopher Yowan. Matthew Helderman. Luke Taylor

Production Buffalo 8 Productions. RadicalMedia. Third Eye Motion Picture Company.

Certificate 18+

Official site Netflix Site

Season 1

Total Episodes 3
